Name: Adam & Eve
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Lovers of the Sazerac will appreciate this herbal, bourbon-laced cocktail. Spirit-forward but becomes progressively sweeter as it dilutes.
Nutrition: One serving of Adam & Eve contains 226 calories
